name: MUNITIONS INDUSTRIAL BASE TASK FORCE
sampleDescriptions: Assisting domestic munitions manufactures to maintain a viable industrial base/capability under the FY19 Defense Appropriations and Authorizations Bills and through DoD policy and procedures.
